title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: local LLM runner with a simple CLI and REST API that lets you pull, create, and run models like Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, etc. on macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client/SDK for Ollama; install via pip and chat with local models in a few lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you plug Ollama models into chains, agents, RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama; runs in Docker, supports multi-model chats, code highlighting, dark mode.

title: ollama-cli (mattw/ollama-cli)
summary: Community TUI (terminal UI) for interactive Ollama chats with history, syntax highlighting, and model switcher.

title: ollama-copilot (sammcj/ollama-copilot)
summary: GitHub Copilot-style plugin that uses Ollama models for in-editor code suggestions; VS Code extension in beta.

title: ollama-rag (ggerganov/ollama-rag)
summary: Minimal RAG template: uses Ollama embeddings + Chroma to chat with local PDFs; written in Python.

title: ollama4j (ollama/ollama4j)
summary: Community Java SDK for Ollama; Maven artifact provides sync/async clients and POJO model bindings.

title: ollama-csharp (microsoft/ollama-csharp)
summary: Experimental .NET client for Ollama from Microsoft; NuGet package supports chat, embeddings, and tool calling.

title: ollama-helm (otwld/ollama-helm)
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker (ollama/ollama-docker)
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) plus compose examples for running Ollama in Docker/Podman.

title: ollama-haystack (deepset-ai/ollama-haystack)
summary: Haystack integration by deepset; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-rust (pepperoni21/ollama-rust)
summary: Unofficial async Rust crate for Ollama; published on crates.io with Tokio support and Serde models.

title: ollama-go (jmorganca/ollama-go)
summary: Lightweight Go client for Ollama; provides chat, generate, and pull APIs with context cancellation.

title: ollama-n8n-node (n8n-io/ollama-n8n-node)
summary: Community node for n8n workflow automation; integrate local LLM prompts into no-code workflows.

title: ollama-django (victorserpa/ollama-django)
summary: Django package adding Ollama model support to Django admin and REST APIs; includes chat widget.

title: ollama-fastapi (tiangolo/ollama-fastapi)
summary: FastAPI template that exposes Ollama endpoints with OpenAI compatibility, CORS, and rate-limiting.

title: ollama-streamlit (streamlit/ollama-streamlit)
summary: Official Streamlit demo app showing how to build a chat UI over Ollama in <100 lines of Python.

title: ollama-discord-bot (cboin/ollama-discord-bot)
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions using Ollama models; supports slash commands and model switching.
